Actions.Name: Organization Details
Actions.Description: Returns detailed information about the company with the given Bitvore ID.

Actions.Name: Organization Search
Actions.Description: Search can be performed using one of two approaches, a lookup or a parameterized query. A lookup takes a single string as input to matching entities. A paramaterized query takes one or more search parameters.

Actions.Name: Organization Matching
Actions.Description: Attempts to find companies matching input specifications made up of a list of property values. Multiple companies can be matched in a single call.
